languages.text: "Думаю, Махарий потерял бдительность и пострадал от собственной неосмотрительности. Не думаю, что он или Гетка знали о действиях Регины. Это... печальный, но справедливый {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}финал{/d} этой истории".

traits.locale_text: "Род Зауэрбеков был одним из первых, прибывших в Простор Коронус. Они веками несли свою службу Императору и никогда до этого не были уличены в неверности. Думаю, Махарий потерял бдительность и пострадал от собственной неосмотрительности — как чуть было не пострадала Клеменциа и весь род Версериан. Не думаю, что он или Гетка знали о действиях Регины. Это... печальный, но справедливый конец для их семьи".

languages.text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, Махарий потерял бдительность и пострадал от собственной неосмотрительности. Не думаю, что он или Гетка знали о действиях Регины. Это... печальный, но справедливый {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}финал{/d} этой истории".

traits.locale_text: "I think Macharia has let his guard down and suffered from his own imprudence. I do not think that neither him nor Hetka have been aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad, but just, finale of their tale."

"I think Macharia has let his guard down and suffered from his own imprudence. I do not think that neither him nor Hetka have been aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad, but just, finale of their tale."
"I think Macharius has let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I don't think either he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad yet just finale of their tale."

"I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just conclusion to their story."

"I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

"I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

languages.text: 「マハリウスは軽率にも護衛の責任を怠り、犠牲者を出しました。彼もヘトカも、レジーナの動向に気づいていたとは思えません。これは…悲劇的ですが、正義の{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}幕引き{/d}です」
languages.original_text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

traits.locale_text: 「マハリウスは軽率にも護衛の責任を怠り、犠牲者を出しました。彼もヘトカも、レジーナの動向に気づいていたとは思えません。これは…悲劇的ですが、正義の{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}幕引き{/d}です」

languages.text: “这也要怪马卡里乌斯过于松懈大意，最终自食恶果。我想，他和赫特卡都对蕾吉娜的罪行一无所知。然而……所谓荣辱与共，这是个悲惨但不失公正的{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}结局{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

traits.locale_text: “这也要怪马卡里乌斯过于松懈大意，最终自食恶果。我想，他和赫特卡都对蕾吉娜的罪行一无所知。然而……所谓荣辱与共，这是个悲惨但不失公正的结局。”

languages.text: « Je pense que Macharius a baissé sa garde et a été victime de sa propre imprudence. Ni lui ni Hetka n'avaient l'air d'être au courant des agissements de Régina. C'est une {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d}... triste, mais juste à leur histoire. »
languages.original_text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que Macharius a baissé sa garde et a été victime de sa propre imprudence. Ni lui ni Hetka n'avaient l'air d'être au courant des agissements de Régina. Votre verdict m'attriste, mais vous avez été juste. »

languages.text: «Me da a mí que Macharius ha bajado la guardia y ha sido víctima de su propia imprudencia. No creo que ni él ni Hetka fueran conscientes de los movimientos de Regina. Es un... triste pero justo {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}final{/d} a su historia».
languages.original_text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

traits.locale_text: «Me da a mí que Macharius ha bajado la guardia y ha sido víctima de su propia imprudencia. No creo que ni él ni Hetka fueran conscientes de los movimientos de Regina. Es un... triste pero justo final a su historia».

languages.text: "Ich glaube, Macharius ist unvorsichtig geworden und seiner eigenen Unbedachtsamkeit zum Opfer gefallen. Ich glaube, weder er noch Hetka wussten von Reginas Taten. Das ist ein ... trauriges, aber gerechtes {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}Ende{/d} ihrer Geschichte."
languages.original_text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, Macharius ist unvorsichtig geworden und seiner eigenen Unbedachtsamkeit zum Opfer gefallen. Ich glaube, weder er noch Hetka wussten von Reginas Taten. Das ist ... ein trauriges, aber gerechtes Ende ihrer Geschichte."

"Ich glaube, Macharius ist unvorsichtig geworden und seiner eigenen Unbedachtsamkeit zum Opfer gefallen. Ich glaube, weder er noch Hetka wussten von Reginas Taten. Das ist ein ... trauriges, aber gerechtes Ende ihrer Geschichte."

languages.text: "Zannediyorum ki Macharius, gardını indirip kendi ihtiyatsızlığına yenik düştü. Regina'nın yaptıklarından onun yahut Hetka'nın haberdar olduğunu düşünmüyorum. Böylece ömürleri... Mahzun ama adil bir şekilde {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}sonlanmış{/d} oldu."
languages.original_text: "I think Macharius let his guard slip and fell victim to his own imprudence. I do not believe he or Hetka were aware of Regina's actions. This is... a sad but just {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}conclusion{/d} to their story."

traits.locale_text: "Zannediyorum ki Macharius gardını indirdi ve kendi ihtiyatsızlığına yenik düştü. Regina'nın yaptıklarından onun yahut Hetka'nın haberdar olduğunu düşünmüyorum. Böylece ömürleri... mahzun ama adil bir {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledGuilty}sona{/d} kavuşmuş oldu."
